description:
Hi all,

on instance creation I used to inject custom metadata using euca-run-instances -d option.
I was able to retrive those data on http://169.254.169.254/latest/user-data/
How do I get the custom metadata while injecting them using a command like:
nova boot --flavor=1 --image=2 --meta mykey1=myval1 --meta mykey2=myval2  serverName
?
Thank a lot
Giuseppe
title: nova client does not support eject user data to instance when booting an instance.

comments.content:
Hi all,

on instance creation I used to inject custom metadata using euca-run-instances -d option.
I was able to retrive those data on http://169.254.169.254/latest/user-data/
How do I get the custom metadata while injecting them using a command like:

Giuseppe
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~heut2008

comments.content: my fault, I misunderstand your meaning.not a bug.
